Header.title: Harvesting the Sun's energy for better tomorrow
Header.paragraph: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Duis sed dapibus leo nec ornare diam sed commodo nibh ante facilisis bibendum.

About.paragraph: Agri-Sun Ethiopia Engineering and Trading Pvt. Ltd. Co. is legally established company based in Ethiopia. It is duly registered with the Ministry of Trade and Industry, Inland Revenue Authority and Ministry of Finance and Economic Development with trade license MT/AA/2/0054060/2015 and has a trade license for Electro-Mechanical Contractor Grade-5.
About.paragraph2: Agri-Sun Ethiopia is mainly focused in providing affordable and sustainable solar systems solutions to small landholder farmers who donâ€™t have access to national power grid electrification connection.
About.paragraph3: The company offers water well drilling services, solar-powered water pump systems, water-saving irrigation systems and value chain activities for the rural community. Agri-Sun's goal is to improve farmers' livelihoods and reduce their reliance on fossil fuels by providing innovative, affordable, and sustainable solar powered water pumping system solutions to increase crop yields and unlock their labor capital and small holding land's potential in the ever-changing climatic conditions.

Services.name: Water-Well Drilling
Services.text: Our team of experts can drill wells to provide access to clean water for irrigation and other agricultural needs. We use state-of-the-art equipment to ensure the wells are safe, efficient and sustainable.

Services.name: Solar-Powered Water Pump
Services.text: Our solar water pump is an eco-friendly alternative to traditional water pumping systems. It uses the power of the sun to pump water, making it a cost-effective solution for farmers and rural communities.

Services.name: Water-Saving Irrigation
Services.text: We provide solutions for water-saving irrigation, which helps farmers to conserve water and reduce their operating costs. Our solutions include drip irrigation, sprinkler systems, and other innovative technologies.

Services.name: Value Chain Activities
Services.text: We help farmers to develop and enhance their value chain activities, from growing and harvesting crops to processing and selling their products. We work with farmers to optimize their production and marketing processes, helping them to increase their income and improve their livelihoods.

Services.name: Urban Agriculture
Services.text: Our team of experts can help you set up and manage an urban agriculture project. Whether you want to grow food for your family or start a commercial enterprise, we can provide guidance and support every step of the way.

Services.name: Systems Design
Services.text: Our systems design team can help you plan and implement sustainable agriculture and water management systems. From choosing the right crops and equipment to developing efficient irrigation systems, we'll work with you to ensure your project is a success.

Features.title: Sustainability
Features.text: We are committed to promoting renewable energy and sustainable agriculture, and to minimizing our impact on the natural environment.

Features.title: Affordability
Features.text: We strive to make the latest solar technology accessible to all farmers, regardless of their financial means.

Features.title: Innovation
Features.text: We are dedicated to providing cutting-edge solutions that enable farmers to increase crop yields and improve their livelihoods.

Features.title: Equity
Features.text: We believe that all farmers should have equal access to the latest technology, and we strive to support the development of local communities.

Features.title: Partnership
Features.text: We value collaboration and cooperation, and we work closely with our clients, partners, and stakeholders to achieve our shared goals.
